title: 125: Broads Beating Cancer
itunes:title: 125: Broads Beating Cancer
description:
The Broads are joined by OG Broad Mariah McIntyre who shares about her journey with beating cancer twice by the age of 21. They chat about how she found out, the difference in her journey between cancer at 14 vs cancer at 19, her hospital experiences, anger at her body, loneliness, change in relationships, where she is at now, how people can be there for someone going through cancer, and much more. 
MARIAH MCINTYRE:
Follow her on Instagram at: @mariahbmcintyre
You can watch her documentary “ISOLATED - My BMT Journey” here: https://youtu.be/foT_qU0yh4E
And hear a song she recorded while in the hospital called “Face Down” here: https://youtu.be/ObFGbnEj52A
